title: i got perma for not a strong reason
body: ok look i know i am not the nicest person but i got perma banned for no reason.so i got  a 14 day ban for being toxic but now my suspesion was ended i played another ranked game says to my 1/7 kai sa retarded and then the next day i found out i got perma banned.i know that i need to get 2 14 days banned and then the next one is a perma so waht do i do :(.

replies.body: Calling a teammate "retarded" is typically considered a very good reason to get a permanent ban, honestly. Especially coming off a recent 14-day ban, which is the last chance given for you to reform your behavior.
isnt there a way to "heal" your account with good behavior as well?

> [{quoted}](name=TheSnowyLeopard,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gViPUVvG,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-06-07T19:57:09.096+0000)
>
> isnt there a way to "heal" your account with good behavior as well?

Yep. If you show, over a large number of games, that your behavior has improved, your punishment tier will drop.

>i know that i need to get 2 14 days banned and then the next one is a perma

No you don't.

The ban after the first 14-day punishment can very easily be a perma, especially if you show poor behavior soon after the 14-day ban.

> i know that i need to get 2 14 days banned and then the next one is a perma

Don't know where you heard this, but it's not true. The punishment escalation will only give one 14 day ban and after that the next punishment for any kind of toxicity will result in a permanent ban. The only reason why you would receive a second 14 day ban is if you managed to lower your punishment tier, which, on average, takes around 3 months of actively playing while also showing reformed behavior.
but i know taht i need to get banned 2 times before a perma soo what?
If you reach the 14-day ban your next punishment can be a permanent one. That means if your first punishment is a 14-day ban your second punishment can be a perma.

nope. you only get 1 14-day ban chance. Next punishment after that is a permaban. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-#h1q2

There isnt specific order tbh, and there really sholdn't be a specific order too.

There is a specific order.

10 game chat restrict
25 game chat restrict
14 day ban
Perm ban.

Steps in the order can be skipped though depending on how bad the behavior is.
